review_data.title: Good lunch option
review_data.content: They have a quite good panini variety offer. Service and order may be sometimes a bit slow but mostly for the many people that come at lunch time. Easy, relaxed atmosphere and good quality to price.

review_data.title: Good food, good drinks and good company
review_data.content: I really enjoy being @jaime! i like the sandwiches very much, the new salad is super tasty and you always have nice company. A bar which is differnet compared to other bars in zurich, but in a positiv way. Thanks for the super nice service!
